Jun Fujiwara, (born 23 November 1982), is a Japanese futsal player who plays for Bardral Urayasu and the Japanese national futsal team.
Clubs
* 2008-2010 Shriker Osaka
* 2010- Bardral Urayasu
Titles
* F.League Ocean Cup (2)
** 2008, 2009
